game_name: Can You Do It - VR Experience
game_description: Can You Do It is the epic experience of Virtual Reality Technology. (Supports 90Hz/120Hz on Oculus Quest 2) Experience and play with hang gliding, city crossing, shooting, ladder climbing, zip-lining, Elevator failure, and many more coming soon in an update. Can you do it? If Yes then don't release the grab button during play else you might fall down. Play in free mode and time challenge mode. +++ Features +++ = Gun Hunt Mode = Hand Gliding = Dual Rope Crossing = Zip Lining = Elevator Failure = Ladder Climbing Experience city from the top of the sky by doing Hang Gliding, Feel real - Climb the ladder and cross the road with rope, shooting, like a real experience. Experience the power of virtual reality. (To enable 120Hz, open the universal menu, go to Settings > Experimental Features, and then enable 120 Hz, Software version 28 required)
Languages: English, English (US), English (Australia), English (Canada), English (South Africa), English (UK)
review_1: Never could get the floor in the right place. Looked right when I set it up but once in game it was too low. Made rope crossing weird. Ropes in my chest
review_2: I only wanted some functions in The Climb 2. This game satisfied what I wanted.
review_3: The overall game idea seems interesting but the actual game itself is somewhat crap, the game looks like a mobile game I would get on a iPhone 5 the detection for when you grab is horrid and the game gets boring extremely fast, there is barely anything to do and in my opinion was a waste of money, a game like this shouldnâ€™t even cost money.
review_4: I quite enjoy the game especially climbing, it feels realistic and exiting when you can see how perspectively small you are.
review_5: You will put this game away after 15 minutes and never play it again. Very basic, not recommended
